**ç»§æ‰¿ï¼š** :ref:`Node<class_Node>` **<** :ref:`Object<class_Object>`

è¡¨ç¤ºä»£ç†åˆ°è¾¾å¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥çš„ä¿¡å·ã€‚å½“ä»£ç†ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°è·¯å¾„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„ :ref:`path_desired_distance<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_path_desired_distance>` èŒƒå›´å†…ï¼Œä¸”è¯¥ä½ç½®æ˜¯å¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥æ—¶å‘å‡ºã€‚

**target_reached**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_signal_target_reached>`

è¡¨ç¤ºä»£ç†åˆ°è¾¾ç›®æ ‡çš„ä¿¡å·ï¼Œå³ä»£ç†ç§»åˆ°äº†ä¸ :ref:`target_position<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_target_position>` ç›¸è· :ref:`target_desired_distance<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_target_desired_distance>` ä¹‹å†…çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚æ¯æ¬¡åŠ è½½è·¯å¾„åªä¼šå‘å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡è¿™ä¸ªä¿¡å·ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_signal_velocity_computed:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**velocity_computed**\ (\ safe_velocity\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_signal_velocity_computed>`

Notifies when the collision avoidance velocity is calculated. Emitted every update as long as :ref:`avoidance_enabled<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_avoidance_enabled>` is ``true`` and the agent has a navigation map.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_property_avoidance_priority:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`float<class_float>` **avoidance_priority** = ``1.0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_avoidance_priority>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_avoidance_priority**\ (\ value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_avoidance_priority**\ (\ )

è¯¥ä»£ç†ä¸ä¼šé’ˆå¯¹ :ref:`avoidance_mask<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_avoidance_mask>` å­˜åœ¨åŒ¹é…ä½† :ref:`avoidance_priority<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_avoidance_priority>` æ›´ä½çš„ä»£ç†è°ƒæ•´é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚ç›¸åº”åœ°ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§æ›´ä½çš„ä»£ç†åˆ™ä¼šå¯¹å…¶é€Ÿåº¦è¿›è¡Œæ›´å¤§çš„è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…ä¸è¿™ä¸ªä»£ç†å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_property_radius:

- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_radius**\ (\ )

è¯¥é¿éšœä»£ç†çš„åŠå¾„ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯è¯¥é¿éšœä»£ç†çš„â€œèº«ä½“â€ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯é¿éšœæœºåˆ¶çš„èµ·å§‹åŠå¾„ï¼ˆç”± :ref:`neighbor_distance<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_neighbor_distance>` æ§åˆ¶ï¼‰ã€‚

ä¸ä¼šå½±å“æ­£å¸¸çš„å¯»è·¯ã€‚è¦ä¿®æ”¹è§’è‰²çš„å¯»è·¯åŠå¾„ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨çƒ˜ç„™ :ref:`NavigationMesh<class_NavigationMesh>` èµ„æºæ—¶ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„ :ref:`NavigationMesh.agent_radius<class_NavigationMesh_property_agent_radius>` å±æ€§ï¼Œé’ˆå¯¹ä¸åŒçš„è§’è‰²å¤§å°ä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„å¯¼èˆªåœ°å›¾ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_property_simplify_epsilon:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`float<class_float>` **simplify_epsilon** = ``0.0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_simplify_epsilon>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_simplify_epsilon**\ (\ value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_simplify_epsilon**\ (\ )

The path simplification amount in worlds units.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_property_simplify_path:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **simplify_path** = ``false`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_simplify_path>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_simplify_path**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **get_simplify_path**\ (\ )

If ``true`` a simplified version of the path will be returned with less critical path points removed. The simplification amount is controlled by :ref:`simplify_epsilon<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_simplify_epsilon>`. The simplification uses a variant of Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm for curve point decimation.

Path simplification can be helpful to mitigate various path following issues that can arise with certain agent types and script behaviors. E.g. "steering" agents or avoidance in "open fields".

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_property_target_desired_distance:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`float<class_float>` **target_desired_distance** = ``10.0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_target_desired_distance>`

- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_target_desired_distance**\ (\ )

ä¸ç›®æ ‡çš„è·ç¦»é˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œå°äºè¯¥é˜ˆå€¼æ—¶ä¼šè®¤ä¸ºå·²æŠµè¾¾ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®ã€‚å·²æŠµè¾¾ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®æ—¶ä¼šå‘å‡º :ref:`target_reached<class_NavigationAgent2D_signal_target_reached>` å¹¶ç»“æŸå¯¼èˆªï¼ˆè§ :ref:`is_navigation_finished<class_NavigationAgent2D_method_is_navigation_finished>` å’Œ :ref:`navigation_finished<class_NavigationAgent2D_signal_navigation_finished>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

å°†è¿™ä¸ªå±æ€§è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå¤§äº :ref:`path_desired_distance<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_path_desired_distance>` çš„å€¼å¯ä»¥æå‰ç»“æŸå¯¼èˆªï¼ˆå¯¼èˆªä¼šåœ¨åˆ°è¾¾æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªè·¯å¾„ç‚¹ä¹‹å‰åœæ­¢ï¼‰ã€‚

å°†è¿™ä¸ªå±æ€§è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå°äº :ref:`path_desired_distance<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_path_desired_distance>` çš„å€¼åˆ™ä¼šè®©å¯¼èˆªåœ¨æ›´æ¥è¿‘ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®çš„åœ°æ–¹ç»“æŸï¼ˆå¯¼èˆªåœ¨æŠµè¾¾æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªè·¯å¾„ç‚¹åä¸ä¼šç«‹å³åœæ­¢ï¼‰ã€‚ä¸è¿‡å¦‚æœè®¾å¾—å¤ªå°ï¼Œä»£ç†å°±ä¼šé™·å…¥é‡æ–°ç§»åŠ¨çš„å¾ªç¯ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯æ¬¡ç‰©ç†å¸§æ›´æ–°æ—¶ç§»åŠ¨çš„è·ç¦»éƒ½ä¼šè¶…è¿‡ä¸ç›®æ ‡çš„å®é™…è·ç¦»ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_method_distance_to_target:

è¿”å›ä¸ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®çš„è·ç¦»ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ä»£ç†çš„å…¨å±€ä½ç½®ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·å¿…é¡»è®¾ç½® :ref:`target_position<class_NavigationAgent2D_property_target_position>` æ‰èƒ½è·å¾—ç²¾ç¡®ç»“æœã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_NavigationAgent2D_method_get_avoidance_layer_value:
